The claim was published in a Facebook po: 2019, and has been shared more than 2,900 times.
The claim states that Australia doubled: 3. Australia's population did indeed double from over 11.9 million in 1967 to more than 23.9 million in 2015, according to the Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS).
However: it is false to claim that Australia did not build any power plants or major water projects during this period. Between 1967 and 2015, 20 coal-fired power stations were built in Australia, and significant investments were made in water projects between 1997 and 2010.
